BodyName: Committee on Cultural Affairs, Libraries and International Intergroup Relations

Items.Title: Resolution honoring the memory of over 400 Colonial Era remains of Africans uncovered during 1991 in Lower Manhattan, and calling upon the United States General Services Administration to immediately re-inter the remains of the 427 Africans that were unearthed and to construct a museum and memorial plaque to honor the historic and vitally important African Burial Ground.
Items.MatterName: Honoring the memory of over 400 Colonial Era remains of Africans uncovered during 1991.
